styles.QLineEdit: color: #4B0082; background-color: #FFE4F8; border: 2px solid #FFB6C1; border-radius: 6px; padding: 4px;
styles.QPushButton: QPushButton { background-color: #FFB6C1; color: #4B0082; border: 2px solid #FF69B4; border-radius: 8px; padding: 6px; font-weight: bold; } QPushButton:hover { background-color: #FF69B4; } QPushButton:pressed { background-color: #FF1493; }
